author: Maya Chen
content: Just closed our seed round after 6 months of pipeline work, 60+ investor calls, and a final 8-week process. Happy to share what worked (and what didn't) if anyone is currently fundraising. Drop your questions below.

author: Arjun Patel
content: Hot take: most startup landing pages say too much. We cut our homepage copy by 60%, added one clear CTA, and conversion went up 34% in two weeks. Less is genuinely more — especially above the fold.

author: Sofia Morales
content: Looking for a co-founder with a strong engineering background. Building in the compliance automation space — early traction, pre-revenue, based in Berlin but remote-first. Ideally someone who has shipped B2B SaaS before. DM if interested.
